title: Industrial and Labour Relations (Fees) Regulations, 2018
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 501
Gazette dated Friday, 4th May, 2018
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.35 OF2018
The Industrial and Labour Relations Act
(Laws,Volume15,Cap.269)
The Industrial and Labour Relations (Fees)
Regulations, 2018
INEXERCISEofthepowerscontainedinsection112oftheIndustrial
andLabourRelationsAct,thefollowingregulationsaremade:
1. TheseRegulationsmaybecitedastheIndustrialandLabour Title
Relations(Fees)Regulations,2018.
2. The fees set out in the Schedule are payable in respect of Fees
themattersspecifiedintheSchedule.
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101,Lusaka,PriceK4.00 each
